DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether contact parent adolescent overdue routine vaccine contact parent AND adolescent overdue routine vaccine improve immunization rate compare usual care .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize controlled trial 3-armed study design evaluate immunization recall system adolescent . In control arm ( Group 1 ) , adolescent receive usual care , primarily receive immunization annual physical exam , recommend provider urgent care visit . In one intervention arm ( Group 2 ) , parent/guardian receive telephone call inform adolescent overdue one immunization ( conjugate Neisseria meningitidis ( MCV4 ) vaccine , tetanus-diphtheria-pertussis ( Tdap ) booster , and/or second varicella ( VZV ) vaccine ) . In second intervention arm ( Group 3 ) , parent/guardian adolescent receive telephone call inform adolescent overdue one immunization . Immunization rate compare 3 group four week twelve month follow period .
